dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Moelants, T. 2010. Distichodus noboli. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Distichodus noboli is known from Pool Malebo (Stanley Pool) and from the Lower (Kinsuka rapids) and the Central Congo River basin.

The following is a representative barcode sequence, the centroid of all available sequences for this species.


There are 3 barcode sequences available from BOLD and GenBank.

Below is a sequence of the barcode region Cytochrome oxidase subunit 1 (COI or COX1) from a member of the species.

See the BOLD taxonomy browser for more complete information about this specimen and other sequences.
